pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Farlie-Gumbel-Morgenstern Copula // Compute bivariate dependence measures and perform bivariate competing risks analysis under the generalized Farlie-Gumbel-Morgenstern (FGM) copula. See Shih and Emura (2016) doi:10.1007/s00362-016-0865-5 and Shih and Emura (2017, in re-submission) for details.
